overview.en: Aroma's new media chain truly realizes the complete and fair quantification algorithm of the legal benefits of all participants (producers + readers) in the digital content industry chain, creating a new media digital content industry chain ecosystem driven by blockchain technology.
overview.zh: Aroma新媒体链真正实现数字内容全产业链上所有参与者（生产者+消费者）的合法收益的完整公平量化，创建在区块链技术驱动下的新媒体数字内容全产业链生态圈。
